description_en: Grays created this nightmarish weapon to defend themselves against incursions into their territory. This rifle looks like a long, silver cylinder that ends in two long prongs. When itâ€™s fired, lasers ionize the air between the prongs to send a charge at the target that disrupts cellular bonds. The current is powerful enough to penetrate armor but has no effect on nonliving material, leaving equipment lying in a puddle of organic sludge.
source: Starfinder #26: Flight of the Sleepers pg. 45
